comments.message: Since i already reach the max survey in the feedback app, i’ll post my feedback here, the delivery guy gave me two wrong order instead of coke, gave me milo, and insteas of mcflurry red bean he gave me oreo mcflurry, i know i should have check my order before he leave but bec of trust i didn’t.

Just had a very disappointed double prosperity chix burger. 

Initially was expecting something juicy and nice, i didn't expect I was serve in a fried & hard and dried chix patty swimming 1L of black pepper sauce in my burger to numb and tired my mouth by chewing on it.
I remember the chix patty use for prosperity burger is grill, never use fried like this, and is hard and dried...
If I had known the chix patty going to turn out hard and dried and swim in 1L of sauce, I would rather prefer to order the double cheese burger at least it won't be so dry...

Never been so disappointed in a burger before but MacDonald just make it happen...

How to feel happy and prosperous when your ‘crew leader’ Shidaa at Airport T2 outlet acts as she owns Macdonald’s and everyone owes her a living? How you can promote such a rude person with zero CS skills is really beyond me.

comments.message:
Im A Macdonalds Fans till 5am in the morning of 11 february 2018, im back from my shift work and decided to have my early breakfast at jurong Superbowl macdonals around 5+am...while having my meal, i heard an arguments between two macdonalds staff colleauges, and one of the indian Colleauges shouted "melayu islam babi" i beleived hes an indian staff from malaysia...so here my point...if i were to conffront your staff that is being racist, trust me, i would end up behind bars and your indian staff maybe in hospital..so i cool down myself walk home and have a good sleep hoping that i would forget the incidents...to my shock im awake now and couldnt get it out of my head...and im feeling very angry about your indian staff comment...and i would like macdonalds to take action on the indian guy who was slap by a muslim macdonalds staff for the racist comment...i beleived he deserved not only to be slap but more...

ive made a complain and yet no reply!!!!!!!

I haven't had Mc Donald's breakfast in forever.. namely because your portions are lacking and your meal quality is absolute garbage. KFC's breakfast platter is actually way more value for money, AND more filling. You guys need to up your game, when the competition are actually serving scrambled eggs that look like scrambled eggs vs your idea of a scrambled eggs which are almost always small and 1 retangular block of mushy eggs.

And let's not forget how much more awesome their bacon is.
Really McDonalds where's the other half of my McSpicy fillet?😞
No i want mcgriddles🙄
Ghh
Hola ghh

20.post_text:
Our crispy fries just got fluffy! Receive this ‘upsized’ Fries Cushion (60cm) for free when you order SGD50 or more worth of McDonald’s on McDelivery (App/Web) in a single day from now until 6 Feb 2018. It’s limited to the first 30 customers who order between 5pm to 11pm. Be sure to hurry and order your favourite meals today at http://bit.ly/McDeliveryxUberEats! 

Terms and conditions apply. More details at http://bit.ly/McDeliveryFriesCushion

comments.message: I am super piss off with the order. What is this inside my drink? Like that must check my drink. Or buy green tea so I can see clearly what inside. Very disgusting and disturbing.

What a very bad experience we had in your Mcdonalds delivery... this manager name vashna.called herself manager who ant explained well why our food wasn’t deliver. She try to find a reason but it doesn’t not justify why our food was deliver and cancel it. They said they call my number but we never see any call or miscall at all. The only reason is why our food wasn’t deliver was they deliver guy doesn’t know how to press the buzzer. Claiming that the guy knocking our door. How can he knock on our door step if they didn’t press our buzzer for us to open the get for them to reach in our door step. In her answer to me it only shows that the guy never really knock on our doorstep because he never reach on our door. Before u reach our door step we need to open the gate. In order for someone to come in they should press the buzzer. Now her alibi to me is they tried calling my number which I never receives call at all. I asked why do I need to call me. Her answer was because they are on the way to deliver. But the whole truth is the guy doesn’t know how to press our gate buzzer. Then her next alibi was we need to call before we deliver. But why lastnight no one called us when they deliver our order or our order is going to be deliver. If u do call before deliver why lastnght and the other night when we order they didn’t call me and the food still reach us. Why this deliver guy have to call me which they never did anyway.  They didn’t managed to deliver our order. But why other delivery guy even without call us they manage to deliver the food. Then here is her next alibi. Tell did u out a remarks to press the buzzer. Oh my god.. I’m a condo or a landed house in order for someone to let u in the gate or doorstep u need to press the buzzer. So I said lastnight and the other night we ddnt put press the buzzer but our food was delivered. She is finding an alibi which she herself can’t justify their incompetent and not accurate sop when they deliver order. They said they call customer before they deliver order. But why I never received any call yesterday, the other day that they are delivering our order.and why we receive our order even without a call before deliver. And even we didn’t put a remarks  to press the buzzer the food was still delivered. I need a proper response  on this. A better explanation.

Hey MCD, your delivey services in Tanglin area is very bad.  We cannot order food and the common excuse is the restaurant is not taking order.  If you know that your outlet cannot cope, there are few other outlets around and why not assign the orders to them?
Your guys on the hotline aren't helpful. When i said i will feedback on FB, they gave a reply "up to you" and hung up the line.
Where did the good customer service Mcd had previously? disappeared with the new managing company?
Yeah... anytime, anywhere indeed. You changed the status from “In Progress” to “Delivered” immediately but my food is nowhere in sight!

I have been visiting McDonald Tiong Bahru very often. While during the past 1 and half year, as long as I chose Take away the food. What I received is always less than my order or wrong food: Double beef burger became Single piece;10 drumlets became only 9. As these things happened too much(over 10 times), I have to leave a message at Your singapore web feedback page. However, it has been over 1 month and still no feedback. I have to comment here!
Kelana jaya branch,always not available and send short item or medium fries in large container.
wtf is wrong with your online system. i am always stuck at the sms page waiting for sms and yet there aren't any sms sent to my phone... thus making my order fail... you guys working or not??? !!!

comments.message:
Hi, I have been a regular customer of your restaurant.  If you can track my record, I've been ordering almost every Sunday (and sometimes, even weekday).

I requested for more margarines for my order but am declined by your manager located at Seletar Mall?!  You guys got to understand as each and everyone of us are having different eating habits and preferences.  Even when I have my Big Breakfast, I need at least 2 for each buns, 2 for the egg, 1 for sausage and 1 for hash brown.  And not to mention of my hotcakes (2 each) too!  

And now I am only able to get 10 margarines the max?!  What the hell are you guys thinking to determine or changing my eating habit or preferences when I am the customer (regular)?!?!

wtf is wrong with your online system. i am always stuck at the sms page waiting for sms and yet there aren't any sms sent to my phone... thus making my order fail... you guys working or not??? !!! you guys forcing poeple to pay by credit card or simply stop eating from mc???
Nw a days McDonald's staff n managers don't ever serve customers in orders n The McDonald's management also don't hander complaint to customers😤😔
I'm on TEAM QUARTER POUNDER. Gonna grab it when you release it. Oh wait, ya'll removed it. Burger King where ya at?

Hi, my husband ordered the buttermilk chicken at seletar mall but when he got home it was a regular beef burger inside with onions. Super disappointing that the staff made this kind of mistake especially since the price difference was so great. Hope that u will feedback to the outlet on this. Thank you.
BBQ Pulled chicken is horrible..... Buttermilk all the way !

Pulled Chicken Burger is nice but u need to be more generous with the amount of pulled chicken. So i am going with buttermilk crispy chicken
